Package energy.model

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
energy.model.Tile
public class Tile extends Object
Represents a tile of Energy.

      public static Tile of(TileShape shape, Border border, Position position, Component component)
      Returns a new Tile..
      Parameters:
      shape - the shape of the new Tile.
      border - the border of the new Tile.
      position - the position of the new Tile.
      component - the electrical part of the new Tile.
      Returns:
      a new Tile.
      Throws:
      IllegalBorderException - if the border does not correspond to the provided shape

      component - the electrical part of the new Tile
      Returns:
      a hexagonal Tile

      Parameters:
      shape - The shape of the new Tile.
      position - The position of the new Position.
      Returns:
      a new Tile without connected borders and an empty Component.

    • addNeighbor

      public void addNeighbor(Tile neighbor)
      Adds to the list of neighbors the given Tile. If it is already present, nothing is done. If addition is possible this Tile is also added to the neighbor's neighbors.
      Parameters:
      neighbor - the neighbor to add

    • removeNeighbor

      public void removeNeighbor(Tile neighbor)
      Removes the specified neighbor. Also removes this Tile from the neighbor's neighbors.
      Parameters:
      neighbor - the neighbor to remove
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if neighbor is not a neighbor

    • isPowered

      public boolean isPowered()
      Returns true if this Tile's component is a source or a neighbor is powered.
      Returns:
      true if this Tile's component is a source or a neighbor is powered

    • isNeighbor

      public boolean isNeighbor(Tile tile)
      Returns true if tile is a neighbor.
      Parameters:
      tile - the Tile that might be a neighbor.
      Returns:
      true if tile is a neighbor

      public boolean equals(Object other)

      public int hashCode()
      Overrides:

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this Tile is empty.
      Returns:
      true if this Tile has no borders and its component is Component.EMPTY

    • getLevelFileRepresentation

      public String getLevelFileRepresentation()
      Returns the representation of this Tile as if a level file (.nrg). If this Tile is empty, returns ".". If not, returns a String starting by the diminutive of its component, a blank character followed by the list of the connected borders separated by a blank space in ascending order.
      Returns:
      the level file representation of this Tile.

      Returns the row position of this Tile.
